A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Went into the film with high expectations but left felling robbed of what could have been a great installment. The pacing is all over the place\, people in power make very stupid decisions for no reason. Some sequences drag on horrible long. Questions from TFA are just glazed over and push to the side. Who are Rey's parents?\, who is Snoke? They have so much promotional material for characters that have 2 mins on screen....Looking at you BB-9E. It's not as cringe worthy watching as the prequels\, but it's not in any way as great film.
